Row.Text: The whims of the fates have always been cruel to your kind Kyaru. Strong magics may dance from your fingertips, magician, and you may have kept a keen watch over your many enemies, but be wary of distrusting friends. Cherish the bonds you have or risk losing them to the darkness. Your power alone will not assuredly vanquish the many evils of this land, only through unity can you find strength.

Don your regalia noble Princess of Astraea and steel yourself for adventure! On the hunt for delicacies of the orient you will gather many allies to your cause. Those who dine at your table are those who are at your side in strife. Use their strength as your own, and amass a force none have yet seen. Know your birthright and claim it, your charms will make you Queen in but a short time.

The calling of the Lady Ames has led you far, Kokkoro, and your piety has marked you from birth. By her grace your folk have become one with nature, and you draw from her endless bounty, swindle not her generosity. The path is illuminated by faith. Know peace, and many will flock to your banner. Hold her teachings in your heart and your convictions will be made flesh. Enlighten the huddled masses to the true gospel!
The Catty Sorceress, Princess Knight of the Kaiser, Queen of Mamono
Princess Eustiana von Astraea, the Peckish Princess Pecorine
The Faithful Guide, Apostle of Lady Ames
